Caption: The chief guest, Prof. Maneklal Sankalchand Thacker (director general of the Council of Scientific and Industrial Research) addresses the audience at the event held to unveil the portrait of Prof. B. Sengupto, the first Director of IIT Madras
Event: Unveiling of the Portrait of Prof Sengupto
Description: A special event was held at the Instituteâ€™s Open Air Theatre (1968) in honour of Prof. B. Sengupto, the first Director of IIT Madras. The event consisted of the unveiling of a life size portrait (of the former director) and a series of speeches given by the dignitaries who were present at the event. The chief guest for the event was Prof. Maneklal Sankalchand Thacker, an Indian power engineer, academic and the director general of the Council of Scientific and Industrial Research, the largest research and development organization in India. In the image the dignitaries are seen conversing with one another at the venue. In the image Prof. M. S. Thacker addresses the audience. Seated on the dais from the left: Prof. R. K. Gupta (HOD, Humanities and Social Sciences), an individual who is yet to be identified (possibly the portrait artist) Dr. A. L. Mudaliar (Chairman, Board of Governors), Prof. A. Ramachandran (Director) and Prof. S. Sampath (Deputy Director)
